mapper.sql: customerCode, customerUserCode, customerUserAccount, `name`, sex, email, phone, pubOpenId, miniOpenId, vipLevel
mapper.insert: insert into customer_user (customerCode, customerUserCode, customerUserAccount, `password`, `name`, sex, email, phone, pubOpenId, miniOpenId, vipLevel, addTime, updateTime, `enable`, activity, createrCode) values (#{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerUserAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miniOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), null, true, true, #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into customer_login_log(customerCode, customerUserCode, loginTime, loginType, token, endTime, addTime, updateTime, enable, activity, createrCode) values (#{customerCode}, #{customerUserCode}, now(), 1, #{token}, null, now(), null, true, true, #{createrCode})
mapper.update: update customer_login_log set endTime = now(), updateTime = now() where customerUserCode = #{code} and token = #{token} and activity = true and enable = true
mapper.select: select a.*,b.permissionCode,b.permissionName,b.permissionLevel,b.parentCode from customer_user a left join un_customer_user_permission b on a.customerUserCode = b.customerUserCode where a.customerUserAccount = #{customerUserAccount} and a.activity = true and a.enable = true
